p: According to our model, the mean HAI antibody level reached a titer of 40 on day 11 and 80 on day 27 after illness onset ( Fig. 4 (A)), peaked after three months at a GMT of 290 ( Fig. 4(B)), and then declined to a titer of 80 (month 11) and 40 (month 22) ( Fig. 4(A) and (C)). Neutralizing antibody titers increased slower than HAI antibody titers, reached a small peak on day 103 at a GMT of 17, decreased slightly, and then continued to increase until 35 months after illness onset, while HAI antibody titers decreased throughout this period (Supplementary Fig. 6).
